title: MD
biography: Paul Elliott is a leading specialist in Environmental Epidemiology at Imperial College London.
aiSummary: Paul Elliott is a environmental epidemiology specialist with an H-index of 169 at Imperial College London (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet, Nature Genetics, BMJ. Based in United Kingdom.
